mutants.code:
def organize_ducks(N, K, duck_counts):
    store = []
    for i in range(N + 1):
        store.append([duck_counts[i], i])
    store.sort()
    result = []
    x = N
    y = 1
    for i in range(N):
        c1 = store[y][1]
        m1 = store[y][0]
        c2 = store[x][1]
        m2 = K - store[y][0]
        result.append((c1, m1, c2, m2))
        store[x][0] -= m2
        if store[x][0] < K:
            store[y] = store[x]
            x -= 1
        else:
            y += 1
    return result

def organize_ducks(N, K, duck_counts):
    store = []
    for i in range(N + 1):
        store.append([duck_counts[i], i])
    store.sort()
    result = []
    x = N
    y = 0
    for i in range(N):
        c1 = store[y][1]
        m1 = store[y][0]
        c2 = store[x][1]
        m2 = K - store[y][0]
        result.append((c1, m1, c2, m2))
        store[x][0] -= m2
        if store[x][0] < K:
            store[y] = store[x]
            x -= 1
        else:
            y += -1
    return result
